Text: Irish Reform Association:  It failed to gain acceptance due to fierce opposition from Ulster Unionists who on the one hand claimed it went too far, and on the other hand denounced by Irish Nationalists who claimed it did not go far enough.
Triplets:<Irish Reform Association
2:
--------------------
Text: Irish Reform Association:  Also known as the Irish Reform Movement, it ended in calamity for most of those concerned.
